          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kje je položaj slike?</string>
            <string language="en">Where is the image located?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wo wird das Bild lokalisiert?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Où l'image est localisée ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Onde a imagem é encontrada?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dove l'immagine è individuata?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πού η εικόνα βρίσκεται;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Dónde se localiza la imagen?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Iz vode sveti svetilo, kako globoko izgleda položaj svetila, če ga gledamo iz zraka.</string>
            <string language="en">Directed light source is submerged into water. Determine its depth when viewed from the air.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lomni količnik</string>
            <string language="en">refractive index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">navidezna slika</string>
            <string language="en">virtual image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lom svetlobe</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwiesene Lichtquelle wird in Wasser versenkt. 
Stellen Sie seine Tiefe fest, wenn Sie von der Luft angesehen 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La source lumineuse dirigée est submergée dans l'eau. 
Déterminez sa profondeur une fois visualisé à partir de 
l'air.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A fonte clara dirigida é submergida na água. 
Determine sua profundidade quando visto do ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La fonte di luce diretta è sommersa in acqua. 
Determini la relativa profondità una volta osservato dall'aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατευθυνόμενη πηγή φωτός καταδύεται στο ύδωρ. 
Καθορίστε το βάθος του όταν εμφανίζεται από τον αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La fuente de luz dirigida se sumerge en el agua. 
Determine su profundidad cuando está visto del aire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechungsindex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">virtuelles Bild</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
